additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Glycerin, C13-15 Alkane (Sugar Based), Bisethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Undecane, Tridecane, Niacinamide, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Palmitate, Sorbitan Palmitate, Sodium PCA, Anigozanthos Flavidus (Kangaroo Paw) Extract, Disodium EDTA, Xanthan Gum, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong) Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-2, Fragrance.

description: Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid to keep your skin hydrated and plump, while Peptides, Vitamins B3, C, and SKIN ectura helps support the synthesis of collagen and elastin for smoother skin. Suitable for all skin types 50mL
name: Renew Age Defence Day Cream SPF15
